AccountStatus.description: A string enum representing the account status.
AccountStatus.title: AccountStatus

creator_ids.description: The database IDs of the user(s) who created the item.
creator_ids.title: Creator Ids

creators.description: Inlined info for the people associated with this item.
creators.title: Creators

immutable_id.description: The immutable database ID of the entry.
immutable_id.title: Immutable ID

last_modified.description: The timestamp at which the entry was last modified.
last_modified.title: Last Modified

relationships.description: A list of related entries and their types.
relationships.title: Relationships

collection_id.description: A short human-readable/usable name for the collection.
collection_id.title: Collection Id

title.description: A descriptive title for the collection.
title.title: Title

description.description: A description of the collection, either in plain-text or a markup language.
description.title: Description

num_items.description: Inlined number of items associated with this collection.
num_items.title: Num Items

item.description: A reference to item (sample or starting material) entry for the constituent substance.
item.title: Item

quantity.description: The amount of the constituent material used to create the sample.
quantity.title: Quantity

unit.description: The unit symbol for the value provided in `quantity`, default is mass in grams (g) but could also refer to volumes (mL, L, etc.) or moles (mol).
unit.title: Unit

DataBlockResponse.description:
A generic response model for a block, i.e., what is stored in `self.data`
in the corresponding DataBlock class.
DataBlockResponse.title: DataBlockResponse

EntryReference.description:
A reference to a database entry by ID and type.

Can include additional arbitarary metadata useful for
inlining the item data.
EntryReference.title: EntryReference

File.description: A model for representing a file that has been tracked or uploaded to datalab.

revision.description: The revision number of the entry.
revision.title: Revision

revisions.description: An optional mapping from old revision numbers to the model state at that revision.
revisions.title: Revisions

creator_ids.description: The database IDs of the user(s) who created the item.
creator_ids.title: Creator Ids

creators.description: Inlined info for the people associated with this item.
creators.title: Creators

immutable_id.description: The immutable database ID of the entry.
immutable_id.title: Immutable ID

last_modified.description: The timestamp at which the entry was last modified.
last_modified.title: Last Modified

relationships.description: A list of related entries and their types.
relationships.title: Relationships

size.description: The size of the file on disk in bytes.
size.title: Size

last_modified_remote.description: The last date/time at which the remote file was modified.
last_modified_remote.title: Last Modified Remote

item_ids.description: A list of item IDs associated with this file.
item_ids.title: Item Ids

blocks.description: A list of block IDs associated with this file.
blocks.title: Blocks

extension.description: The file extension that the file was uploaded with.
extension.title: Extension

location.description: The location of the file on disk.
location.title: Location

url_path.description: The path to a remote file.
url_path.title: Url Path

source.description: The source of the file, e.g. 'remote' or 'uploaded'.
source.title: Source

time_added.description: The timestamp for the original file upload.
time_added.title: Time Added

source_server_name.description: The server name at which the file is stored.
source_server_name.title: Source Server Name

source_path.description: The path to the file on the remote resource.
source_path.title: Source Path

is_live.description: Whether or not the file should be watched for future updates.
is_live.title: Is Live

File.title: File

Identity.description:
A model for identities that can be provided by external systems
and associated with a given user.

identity_type.description: The type or provider of the identity.

identifier.description: The identifier for the identity, e.g., an email address, an ORCID, a GitHub user ID.
identifier.title: Identifier

name.description: The name associated with the identity to be exposed in free-text searches over people, e.g., an institutional username, a GitHub username.
name.title: Name

verified.description: Whether the identity has been verified (by some means, e.g., OAuth2 or email)
verified.title: Verified

display_name.description: The user's display name associated with the identity, also to be exposed in free text searches.
display_name.title: Display Name

Identity.title: Identity

IdentityType.description: A string enum representing the supported verifiable identity types.
IdentityType.title: IdentityType

KnownType.description: An enumeration of the types of entry known by this implementation, should be made dynamic in the future.
KnownType.title: KnownType

Person.description: A model that describes an individual and their digital identities.

type.description: The entry type as a string.
type.title: Type

immutable_id.description: The immutable database ID of the entry.
immutable_id.title: Immutable ID

last_modified.description: The timestamp at which the entry was last modified.
last_modified.title: Last Modified

relationships.description: A list of related entries and their types.
relationships.title: Relationships

identities.description: A list of identities attached to this person, e.g., email addresses, OAuth accounts.
identities.title: Identities

contact_email.description: In the case of multiple *verified* email identities, this email will be used as the primary contact.
contact_email.title: Contact Email

managers.description: A list of user IDs that can manage this person's items.
managers.title: Managers

account_status.description: The status of the user's account.

Person.title: Person

RelationshipType.description:
An enumeration of the possible types of relationship between two entries.

```mermaid
classDiagram
class entryC
entryC --|> entryA: parent
entryC ..|> entryD
entryA <..> entryD: sibling
entryA --|> entryB : child
```
RelationshipType.title: RelationshipType

relation.description: The type of relationship between the two items. If the type is 'other', then a human-readable description should be provided.

type.description: The type of the related resource.

immutable_id.description: The immutable ID of the entry that is related to this entry.
immutable_id.title: Immutable Id

item_id.description: The ID of the entry that is related to this entry.
item_id.title: Item Id

refcode.description: The refcode of the entry that is related to this entry.
refcode.title: Refcode

description:
A model for representing an experimental sample, based on the connection
with cheminventory.net, which mixes container-level and substance-level
information.

synthesis_constituents.description: A list of references to constituent materials giving the amount and relevant inlined details of consituent items.
synthesis_constituents.title: Synthesis Constituents

synthesis_description.description: Free-text details of the procedure applied to synthesise the sample
synthesis_description.title: Synthesis Description

collections.description: Inlined info for the collections associated with this item.
collections.title: Collections

revision.description: The revision number of the entry.
revision.title: Revision

revisions.description: An optional mapping from old revision numbers to the model state at that revision.
revisions.title: Revisions

creator_ids.description: The database IDs of the user(s) who created the item.
creator_ids.title: Creator Ids

creators.description: Inlined info for the people associated with this item.
creators.title: Creators

immutable_id.description: The immutable database ID of the entry.
immutable_id.title: Immutable ID

last_modified.description: The timestamp at which the entry was last modified.
last_modified.title: Last Modified

relationships.description: A list of related entries and their types.
relationships.title: Relationships

refcode.description: A globally unique immutable ID comprised of the deployment prefix (e.g., `grey`) and a locally unique string, ideally created with some consistent scheme.
refcode.title: Refcode

item_id.description: A locally unique, human-readable identifier for the entry. This ID is mutable.
item_id.title: Item Id

description.description: A description of the item, either in plain-text or a markup language.
description.title: Description

date.description: The date the item was acquired
date.title: Date

name.description: The name of the substance in the container.
name.title: Name

files.description: Any files attached to this sample.
files.title: Files

file_ObjectIds.description: Links to object IDs of files stored within the database.
file_ObjectIds.title: File Objectids

barcode.description: A unique barcode provided by an external source, e.g., cheminventory.
barcode.title: Barcode

date_opened.description: The date the item was opened
date_opened.title: Date Opened

CAS.description: The CAS Registry Number for the substance described by this entry.
CAS.title: Cas

chemical_purity.description: The chemical purity of this container with regards to the defined substance.
chemical_purity.title: Chemical Purity

full_percent.description: The amount of the defined substance remaining in the container, expressed as a percentage.
full_percent.title: Full Percent

GHS_codes.description: A string describing any GHS hazard codes associated with this item.
GHS_codes.title: Ghs Codes

size.description: The total size of the container, in units of `size_unit`.
size.title: Size

chemform.description: A string representation of the chemical formula associated with this sample.
chemform.title: Chemform

molar_mass.description: Mass per formula unit, in g/mol.
molar_mass.title: Molar Mass

smiles_representation.description: A SMILES string representation of a chemical structure associated with this substance.
smiles_representation.title: Smiles Representation

supplier.description: Supplier or manufacturer of the chemical.
supplier.title: Supplier

location.description: The place where the container is located.
location.title: Location

comment.description: Any additional comments or notes about the container.
comment.title: Comment

title: StartingMaterial
